archimate:SystemSoftware.name: OpenCatalogi
archimate:SystemSoftware.documentation:
An open-source platform for managing and discovering software, data, and API catalogs, mainly for public sector organizations.
Key Features: - Centralized registry of open data, APIs, and software components. - Metadata-driven search and categorization. - API integration for automated catalog updates. - Supports linked data standards (RDF, SPARQL).
